description:
Kenta, Daichi, and Bunji are studying at Daichi`s house. Kenta is usually so cocky, but his whole expression changes when he sees Daichi`s turtle. Bunji has never really brought home anything he`s built or drew in school. Mom thinks she should save them as precious memories of his youth. But then one day... Mom is rushing to finish a chapter before her deadline when the power suddenly goes out! Dad finds a flashlight but can`t find any batteries. Mom just gives up... Thanks to a little help, Mom finishes her work. Though she is supposed to cook the next meal, Dad, being no stranger to the outdoors, starts prepping for a barbecue...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Studying at Daichi`s Place / Take It Home / Blackout / Blackout Again
大地くんちでお勉強 / もってかえれ / 停電 / まだ停電
